name: Al Muqaddim
description: One of the 99 names of Allah in Islam, meaning 'The Expediter' or 'The Promoter.'
summary: Al Muqaddim signifies Allah's ability to advance and prioritize matters as He wills. This name reflects His divine wisdom in the way He orders events in the universe, ensuring that everything unfolds according to His plan. It emphasizes the concept that God is in control of all situations, facilitating and hastening what needs to occur in a person's life or the world at large.
